Trade/Device Name(s): ReliOn Premier BLU Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ReliOn Premier BLU Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ReliOn Premier BLU Blood Glucose Monitoring System for self-testing blood glucose using a Bluetooth-enabled meter and test strips
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips by people with diabetes at home for self-testing to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for neonates or diagnosis/screening of diabetes
